TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSTrustResponseBodyWriter extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter

Docs.summary: Represents a message body writer that writes an RSTR to an outgoing message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WSTrustResponseBodyWriter class is an implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> class that supports <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse> objects.

Docs.param: The object (RSTR) to be serialized in the outgoing Message.
The object to use to serialize the RSTR.
A that contains the context for serialization.
Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnWriteBodyContents(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> object to which the RSTR should be written.
Docs.summary: Override of the base class method. Serializes the RSTR to the outgoing stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Serializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse> object associated with this instance to the outgoing stream.
